faqs.question: How does the barbeque concept work?
faqs.answer: At Barbeque Nation, we provide a live grill on your table where you can grill your own starters. Our staff will assist you with marinades and cooking techniques.

faqs.question: Is there a buffet option?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer an all-you-can-eat buffet including live grill starters, main course, and desserts.

faqs.question: Do you have vegan options?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer several vegan dishes. Please inform our staff about your dietary preferences when making a reservation.

faqs.question: How do I make a reservation?
faqs.answer: You can make reservations through our website, phone, or through this chatbot by providing your name, contact details, preferred date, time, and number of guests.
